atk-s0519a0:20_0: Tena yā bhāsitā netti, satthārā anumoditā;
atk-s0519a0:34_2: Yathā hi taṇhā satte kāmādibhavaṁ nayatīti “bhavanettī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:34_3: evamayampi veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṁ nayatīti saddhammanayanaṭṭhena “nettī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a0:34_5: Nettippakaraṇena hi karaṇabhūtena dhammakathikā veneyyasatte dassanamaggaṁ nayanti sampāpentīti,
atk-s0519a0:34_6: nīyanti vā ettha etasmiṁ pakaraṇe adhiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāpetvā veneyyā nibbānaṁ sampāpiyantīti netti.
atk-s0519a0:34_7: Na hi nettiupadesasannissayena vinā aviparītasuttatthāvabodho sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:35_0: Sā panāyaṁ netti pakaraṇaparicchedato tippabhedā hāranayapaṭṭhānānaṁ vasena.
atk-s0519a0:35_5: Sabbāpi hi netti saṅgahavāro vibhāgavāroti vāradvayameva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:36_0: Tattha saṅgahavāro ādito pañcahi gāthāhi paricchinno.
atk-s0519a0:36_1: Sabbo hi pakaraṇattho “yaṁ loko pūjayate”tiādīhi pañcahi gāthāhi apariggahito nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a0:36_7: Mūlapadapaṭṭhānāni hi atthanayasaṅkhārattikā viya aññamaññaṁ saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0519a0:37_1: Tesu “tattha katame soḷasa hārā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti ayaṁ uddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_2: “Assādādīnavatā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “tettiṁsā ettikā nettī”ti ayaṁ niddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_3: Paṭiniddesavāro pana hāravibhaṅgavāro hārasampātavāro nayasamuṭṭhānavāro sāsanapaṭṭhānavāroti catubbidho.
atk-s0519a0:37_4: Tesu “tattha katamo desanāhāro”ti ārabhitvā yāva “ayaṁ pahānena samāropanā”ti ayaṁ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_5: Tattha “katamo desanāhārasampāto”ti ārabhitvā yāva “anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti ayaṁ hārasampātavāro. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a0:37_7: yattha anekehipi udāharaṇasuttehi eko hāro niddisīyati,
atk-s0519a0:37_9: Yattha pana ekasmiṁ sutte aneke hārā sampatanti,
atk-s0519a0:38_0: “Yattha ca sabbe hārā, sampatamānā nayanti suttatthaṁ;
atk-s0519a0:40_1: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāro pana saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi na sarūpato uddhaṭoti. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a0:40_5: Na hi pāḷito aññaṁ pamāṇataraṁ atthi.
atk-s0519a0:40_6: Yā hi catūhi mahāpadesehi aviruddhā pāḷi,
atk-s0519a0:40_8: Tathā hi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya peṭakopadeso viya idaṁ nettippakaraṇaṁ ābhataṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_9: Yadi evaṁ kasmāssa nidānaṁ na vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_14: Sāvakabhāsitānaṁ buddhabhāsitānampi hi ekaccānaṁ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesādīnaṁ dhammapadabuddhavaṁsādīnañca nidānaṁ na bhāsitaṁ,
atk-s0519a0:41_0: Nidānañca nāma suttavinayānaṁ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaupālittherādīhi mahāsāvakeheva bhāsitaṁ,
atk-s0519a0:41_2: theraṁ muñcitvā anaññavisayattā imissā vicāraṇāyāti kimetena nidānagavesanena,
atk-s0519a0:41_5: Atha vā pāḷiyā atthasaṁvaṇṇanābhāvato na imassa pakaraṇassa visuṁ nidānavacanakiccaṁ atthi,
atk-s0519a0:42_0: Idāni etasmiṁ pakaraṇe nānappakārakosallatthaṁ ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo –
atk-s0519a0:43_0: Tividhaṁ puggalattayaniddesato tividhakalyāṇavibhāgato pariññattayakathanato pahānattayūpadesato sikkhattayasaṅgahaṇato
atk-s0519a0:44_1: Pañcavidhaṁ abhiññeyyādidhammavibhāgato pañcakkhandhaniddesato pañcagatiparicchedato pañcanikāyatthavivaraṇato ca.
atk-s0519a0:45_0: Tattha sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti sakalaṁ nettippakaraṇaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa satthusāsanassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanābhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:45_3: Byañjanatthavicārabhāvatoti hārabyañjanapadakammanayānaṁ byañjanavicārattā atthapadaatthanayānaṁ atthavicārattā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:45_6: Lakkhaṇalakkhiyabhāvatoti nettivacanassa lakkhaṇattā udāharaṇasuttānañca lakkhiyattā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:45_10: Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇadhammavibhāgatoti pahānekaṭṭhasahajekaṭṭhatādisāmaññena ye dhammā yesaṁ dhammānaṁ nāmavatthādinā
atk-s0519a0:46_9: vasena cuddasavidhassa suttādhiṭṭhānassa vibhāgavacanato cuddasavidhanti attho.
